name: BuildsysSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on lights in the living room.”
”Alexa, set blinds position to fifty.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Buildsys Smart Home skill allow you to control lights and blinds, which are already implemented in your home and controlled by wago PLC controller.

Here are the voice commands which can be used:
Alexa, discover my devices.

Lights:
Alexa, turn on lights in the living room.
Alexa, turn off lights in the living room.
Alexa, set the living room light to fifty percent.
Alexa, dim the living room lights.

Blinds:
Alexa, set blinds position to fifty.
Alexa, increase blinds position by ten.
Alexa, decrease blinds position by twenty.
Alexa, set blinds angle to eighty.
Alexa, increase blinds angle by thirty.
Alexa, decrease blinds angle by forty.
